description: The revival of Mountain Hardwear's original, best-selling classic that continues to offer premium layering warmth with a unique, ultra-soft feel, the Polartec® High Loft® Jacket features lightweight Polartec® High Loft® fleece with strategically placed panels of stretch fleece for added freedom of movement.
name: Mountain Hardwear Polartec High Loft Jacket - Mens

specs.value: Polartec® High Loft® Fleece - 97% Polyester, 3% Elastane
